about_the_game:
DLC “MILLENIS’ NIGHTMARES”

Many of the events will have new developments. The story of Mortis is coming to an end. Will you manage to pass all of Millenis’ tests and find the one right decision that will allow you to stop the war in the lands of Midian? New dungeons, bosses and plot developments for already familiar heroes await you.

TAROT CARDS AND ADJUSTABLE DIFFICULTY

Real masters of the rogue-like genre can defy fate in the "Millenis Nightmares" mode. Seven Tarot cards with unique gameplay conditions are available for each of the heroes. Compete with other travelers to become first in the ranking of the best players!

NEW PLOT TWIST

In the main game you learned the fates and life missions of Persival, Bjorn, and Vanadis. It’s time to walk the roads of Midian once again and find out what new surprises Mortis and Millenis have prepared for our heroes!
